## packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


## mean and median

```{r}
summary1 <- function(x) {
  c(mean(x), median(x))
}
```

test it

```{r}
x=c(11,12,14,18)
summary1(x)
```

label them using named vector

```{r}
summary1 <- function(x) {
  v <- c(mean(x), median(x))
  names(v) <- c("mean", "median")
  v
}
```

```{r}
summary1(x)
```

```{r}
summary1(x) %>% enframe()
```


mtcars

```{r}
mtcars %>% map_df(~summary1(.)) 
```

```{r}
mtcars %>% map(~summary1(.)) %>% bind_cols()
```


```{r}
mtcars %>% gather(xname, x, everything()) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=1, y=x)) + geom_boxplot() + facet_wrap(~xname, scales="free")
```

or

```{r}
mtcars %>% gather(xname, x, everything()) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=x)) + geom_histogram(bins=6) + facet_wrap(~xname, scales="free")

```
